topic.title: Medication Action Plan Encounter - conformance rules

section.p:
This provides the context (type of encounter, date, place, condition, participants, etc.) of the patient - provider interaction, i.e., medication review, that yielded the medication action plan or the review of the patient's reported follow-up to the action plan.
(What we talked about)
MAP 6

ol.li: SHALL conform to Consol Plan Of Care Activity Encounter template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.40)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text
WHAT WE TALKED ABOUT
Enter a description of the topic that was discussed with the beneficiary, including the medication or care issue to be resolved or the behavior to be encouraged. The Part D plan or MTM provider has the discretion to choose how to make reference to the medication or care issue, such as to list the medication first in the box or add emphasis to that specific text. In some cases, it may be appropriate to tell the beneficiary that the MTM provider will follow up with the physician or other practitioner or to include goals of therapy.
See MAP 6

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship
WHAT I NEED TO DO
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Action Plan Activity (templateId: 111.222.333.444.666)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
WHAT I DID AND WHEN I DID IT
